solution_line_template: Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( {growth_rate_per_month} ) * {months_per_year} = <<({growth_rate_per_month})*{months_per_year}={growth_per_year}>>{growth_per_year} inches per year.

To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of {world_record_length} - {current_length} = <<{world_record_length}-{current_length}={length_to_grow}>>{length_to_grow} inches.
It will take her a total of {length_to_grow} / {growth_per_year} = <<{length_to_grow}/{growth_per_year}={years_to_grow}>>{years_to_grow} years.
Sandy will be {sandy_current_age} + {years_to_grow} = <<{sandy_current_age}+{years_to_grow}={final_age}>>{final_age} years old when she achieves the world record.
